verses.verse: <S%G4569><s%> And Saul <S%G1161><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Consenting <S%G4909><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Killing <S%G336><s%> Of Him. <S%G846><s%> <S%G1096><s%> And Took Place <S%G1161><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> A Persecution <S%G1375><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Against <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> Which Was <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> <S%G3956><s%> And All <S%G5037><s%> Were Scattered <S%G1289><s%> Throughout <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Countries <S%G5561><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Judea <S%G2449><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Samaria <S%G4540><s%> Except <S%G4133><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles. <S%G652><s%>

<S%G4792><s%> And Buried <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Stephen <S%G4736><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Pious, <S%G2126><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> Lamentation <S%G2870><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> ' Over <S%G1909><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G4569><s%> But Saul <S%G1161><s%> Was Ravaging <S%G3075><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly, <S%G1577><s%> House <S%G2596><s%> By <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> Entering, <S%G1531><s%> <S%G4951><s%> And Dragging <S%G5037><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Women <S%G1135><s%> Delivered Them Up <S%G3860><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Prison. <S%G5438><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> They Who <S%G3303><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Had Been Scattered <S%G1289><s%> Passed Through, <S%G1330><s%> Announcing The Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word. <S%G3056><s%>

<S%G5376><s%> And Philip, <S%G1161><s%> Going Down <S%G2718><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A City <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Samaria, <S%G4540><s%> Proclaimed <S%G2784><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

Gave Heed <S%G4337><s%> And <S%G5037><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> To The Things <S%G3588><s%> Spoken <S%G3004><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> <S%G3661><s%> With One Accord, <S%G1722><s%> When <S%G3588><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> They <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saw <S%G991><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Signs <S%G4592><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Did. <S%G4160><s%>

Of Many <S%G4183><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Of Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> Unclean, <S%G169><s%> Crying <S%G994><s%> With A Loud <S%G3173><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> They Went Out; <S%G1831><s%> <S%G4183><s%> And Many <S%G1161><s%> Having Been Paralysed <S%G3886><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lame <S%G5560><s%> Were Healed. <S%G2323><s%>

<S%G435><s%> But A Certain <S%G1161><s%> Man, <S%G5100><s%> By Name <S%G3686><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> Was Formerly <S%G4391><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Using Magic Arts <S%G3096><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Amazing <S%G1839><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nation <S%G1484><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Samaria, <S%G4540><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Great One. <S%G3173><s%>

To Whom <S%G3739><s%> Were Giving Heed <S%G4337><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Small <S%G3398><s%> To <S%G2193><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> This One <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> Great. <S%G3173><s%>

<S%G4337><s%> And They Were Giving Heed <S%G1161><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G1223><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> For A Long <S%G2425><s%> Time <S%G5550><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Magic Arts He <S%G3095><s%> Had Amazed <S%G1839><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G3753><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> They Believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> Announcing The Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> They Were Baptized <S%G907><s%> <S%G435><s%> Both Men <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Women. <S%G1135><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> Believed, <S%G4100><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Been Baptized <S%G907><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Steadfastly Continuing <S%G4342><s%> With <S%G3588><s%> Philip; <S%G5376><s%> Beholding <S%G2334><s%> And <S%G5037><s%> Signs <S%G4592><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Works Of Power <S%G1411><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Being Done, <S%G1096><s%> Was Amazed. <S%G1839><s%>

<S%G191><s%> And Having Heard <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Had Received <S%G1209><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Samaria <S%G4540><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> They Sent <S%G649><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John; <S%G2491><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> Having Come Down <S%G2597><s%> Prayed <S%G4336><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3704><s%> They Might Receive The <S%G2983><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy; <S%G40><s%>

Not Yet <S%G3768><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Was He <S%G2258><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Any <S%G3762><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> Fallen, <S%G1968><s%> <S%G3440><s%> But Only <S%G1161><s%> Baptized <S%G907><s%> They Were <S%G5225><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> They Laid <S%G2007><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Received The <S%G2983><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy. <S%G40><s%>

<S%G2300><s%> But Having Seen <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Laying On <S%G1936><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Holy, <S%G40><s%> He Offered <S%G4374><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Riches, <S%G5536><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> Also To Me <S%G2504><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1849><s%> This Authority, <S%G3778><s%> That On <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whomsoever <S%G302><s%> I May Lay <S%G2007><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands, <S%G5495><s%> He May Receive The <S%G2983><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy. <S%G40><s%>

<S%G4074><s%> But Peter <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Thy <S%G3588><s%> Money <S%G694><s%> With <S%G4675><s%> Thee <S%G4862><s%> May It <S%G4671><s%> Be <S%G1498><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Destruction, <S%G684><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gift <S%G1431><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Thou Didst Think <S%G3543><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Riches <S%G5536><s%> To Be Obtained. <S%G2932><s%>

Repent <S%G3340><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> Thy <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2549><s%> Wickedness <S%G4675><s%> This, <S%G3778><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Supplicate <S%G1189><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , God, <S%G2316><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Indeed <S%G686><s%> May Be Forgiven <S%G863><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thought <S%G1963><s%> Of Thy <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Heart; <S%G4675><s%>

In <S%G1519><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> A Gall <S%G5521><s%> Of Bitterness <S%G4088><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Bond <S%G4886><s%> Of Unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> I See <S%G3708><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> To Be. <S%G5607><s%>

<S%G611><s%> And Answering <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Supplicate <S%G1189><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> On Behalf <S%G5228><s%> Of Me <S%G1700><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> So That <S%G3704><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> May Come <S%G1904><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> Of Which <S%G3739><s%> Ye Have Spoken. <S%G2046><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> They <S%G3303><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Having Earnestly Testified <S%G1263><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Spoken <S%G2980><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Returned <S%G5290><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> <S%G4183><s%> And To Many <S%G5037><s%> Villages <S%G2968><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Samaritans <S%G4541><s%> Announced The Glad Tidings. <S%G2097><s%>

But An Angel <S%G32><s%> Of <S%G1161><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Philip, <S%G5376><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Rise Up <S%G450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Go <S%G4198><s%> Towards The <S%G2596><s%> South, <S%G3314><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Goes Down. <S%G2597><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Gaza : <S%G1048><s%> The Same <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Desert. <S%G2048><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Risen Up <S%G450><s%> He Went. <S%G4198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> An Ethiopian, <S%G128><s%> An Eunuch, <S%G2135><s%> One In Power <S%G1413><s%> Under Candace <S%G2582><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Queen <S%G938><s%> Of The Ethiopians, <S%G128><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Treasure <S%G1047><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Had Come <S%G2064><s%> To Worship <S%G4352><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%>

And <S%G2258><s%> Was <S%G5037><s%> Returning <S%G5290><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sitting <S%G2521><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Chariot, <S%G716><s%> His <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Was Reading <S%G314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet <S%G4396><s%> Isaiah. <S%G2268><s%>

And <S%G2036><s%> Said <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Philip, <S%G5376><s%> Go Near <S%G4334><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Join Thyself <S%G2853><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Chariot. <S%G716><s%> This <S%G5129><s%>

<S%G4370><s%> And Running Up <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Reading <S%G314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet <S%G4396><s%> Isaiah, <S%G2268><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Then Dost <S%G687><s%> Thou <S%G1065><s%> Know <S%G1097><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Thou Readest? <S%G314><s%>

But <S%G3588><s%> He <S%G1161><s%> Said, No, <S%G2036><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For <S%G302><s%> Should I Be Able <S%G1410><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> Some One <S%G5100><s%> Should Guide <S%G3594><s%> Me? <S%G3165><s%> <S%G3870><s%> And He Besought <S%G5037><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> Having Come Up <S%G305><s%> To Sit <S%G2523><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Passage <S%G4042><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Scripture <S%G1124><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Was Reading <S%G314><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> This, <S%G3778><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Sheep <S%G4263><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> Slaughter <S%G4967><s%> He Was Lead, <S%G71><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Lamb <S%G286><s%> Before <S%G1726><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Shears <S%G2751><s%> Him Is <S%G846><s%> Dumb, <S%G880><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> He <S%G3756><s%> Opens <S%G455><s%> Not <S%G3588><s%> Mouth. <S%G4750><s%> His <S%G846><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Humiliation <S%G5014><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judgment <S%G2920><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Was Taken Away, <S%G142><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Generation <S%G1074><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Shall Declare? <S%G1334><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Is Taken <S%G142><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Life. <S%G2222><s%> His <S%G846><s%>

<S%G611><s%> And Answering <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eunuch <S%G2135><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> I Pray <S%G1189><s%> Thee, <S%G4675><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet <S%G4396><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> This? <S%G5124><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Himself, <S%G1438><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Some <S%G2087><s%> Other? <S%G5100><s%>

<S%G455><s%> And Having Opened <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mouth, <S%G4750><s%> His <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Begun <S%G756><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> This <S%G1124><s%> Scripture, <S%G3778><s%> Announced The Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G5613><s%> As <S%G1161><s%> They Were Going <S%G4198><s%> Along <S%G2596><s%> Way, <S%G3588><s%> They <S%G3598><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> A Certain <S%G5100><s%> Water, <S%G5204><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G5346><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eunuch, <S%G2135><s%> , Behold <S%G2400><s%> Water; <S%G5204><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Hinders <S%G2967><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> To Be Baptized? <S%G907><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And Said <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Philip, <S%G5376><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Thou Believest <S%G4100><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Heart, <S%G2588><s%> It Is Lawful. <S%G1832><s%> <S%G611><s%> And Answering <S%G1161><s%> He Said, <S%G2036><s%> I Believe <S%G4100><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Commanded <S%G2753><s%> To Stand Still <S%G2476><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chariot. <S%G716><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Went Down <S%G2597><s%> Both <S%G297><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5204><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Water, <S%G5037><s%> Both Philip <S%G5376><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eunuch, <S%G2135><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Baptized <S%G907><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G3753><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> They Came Up <S%G305><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Water The <S%G5204><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Caught Away <S%G726><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Philip, <S%G5376><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Saw <S%G1492><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> No Longer <S%G3765><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eunuch, <S%G2135><s%> He Went <S%G4198><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Rejoicing. <S%G5463><s%>

Philip <S%G5376><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Was Found <S%G2147><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> Azotus, <S%G108><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Passing Through <S%G1330><s%> He Announced The Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Cities <S%G4172><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> Till <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> He <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Caesarea. <S%G2542><s%>
